member.name: P:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.Data.SiteverificationWebResourceGettokenRequest.Site
member.summary: The site for which a verification token will be generated.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.Data.SiteverificationWebResourceGettokenRequest.VerificationMethod
member.summary: The verification method that will be used to verify this site. For sites, 'FILE' or 'META' methods may be used. For domains, only 'DNS' may be used.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.Data.SiteverificationWebResourceGettokenRequest.SiteData
member.summary: The site for which a verification token will be generated.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.Data.SiteverificationWebResourceGettokenRequest.SiteData.Identifier
member.summary: The site identifier. If the type is set to SITE, the identifier is a URL. If the type is set to INET_DOMAIN, the site identifier is a domain name.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.Data.SiteverificationWebResourceGettokenRequest.SiteData.Type
member.summary: The type of resource to be verified. Can be SITE or INET_DOMAIN (domain name).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.Data.SiteverificationWebResourceGettokenResponse.Method
member.summary: The verification method to use in conjunction with this token. For FILE, the token should be placed in the top-level directory of the site, stored inside a file of the same name. For META, the token should be placed in the HEAD tag of the default page that is loaded for the site. For DNS, the token should be placed in a TXT record of the domain.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.Data.SiteverificationWebResourceGettokenResponse.Token
member.summary: The verification token. The token must be placed appropriately in order for verification to succeed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.Data.SiteverificationWebResourceListResponse.Items
member.summary: The list of sites that are owned by the authenticated user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.Data.SiteverificationWebResourceResource.Id
member.summary: The string used to identify this site. This value should be used in the "id" portion of the REST URL for the Get, Update, and Delete operations.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.Data.SiteverificationWebResourceResource.Owners
member.summary: The email addresses of all verified owners.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.Data.SiteverificationWebResourceResource.Site
member.summary: The address and type of a site that is verified or will be verified.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.Data.SiteverificationWebResourceResource.SiteData
member.summary: The address and type of a site that is verified or will be verified.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.Data.SiteverificationWebResourceResource.SiteData.Identifier
member.summary: The site identifier. If the type is set to SITE, the identifier is a URL. If the type is set to INET_DOMAIN, the site identifier is a domain name.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.Data.SiteverificationWebResourceResource.SiteData.Type
member.summary: The site type. Can be SITE or INET_DOMAIN (domain name).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.SiteVerificationService.Key
member.summary: Sets the API-Key (or DeveloperKey) which this service uses for all requests

member.name: T:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.SiteVerificationService.Scopes
member.summary: A list of all OAuth2.0 scopes. Each of these scopes relates to a permission or group of permissions that different methods of this API may need.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.SiteVerificationService.Scopes.Siteverification
member.summary: Manage the list of sites and domains you control

member.name: M:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.WebResourceResource.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: Relinquish ownership of a website or domain.
member.param: Required - The id of a verified site or domain.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.WebResourceResource.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Get the most current data for a website or domain.
member.param: Required - The id of a verified site or domain.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.WebResourceResource.GetToken
member.summary: Get a verification token for placing on a website or domain.

member.summary: Attempt verification of a website or domain.
member.param: Required - The method to use for verifying a site or domain.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.SiteVerification.v1.WebResourceResource.List
member.summary: Get the list of your verified websites and domains.

member.param: Required - The id of a verified site or domain.
